TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Yanping, title = Yanping, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Yanping} }

S.FORM: Yanping ( , Genhe'I go) mki sku Taitung. su'unun kwara glabang lingay 'kiyan ga 480.64 km (rhyan rinpang glabang lingay 'kiyan ga 419.42 km , rr'an hyan glabang lingay 'kiyan ga 48.33 km ), 3,828 hi ku su'unun kwara alang hi kya, 1,131 buwan ku kwarakya, tiku sahuy na alang Gyencumin ga 3,523 hi, kyala kwara pinspung s'uli ga 92 . kwara sahuy na alang Gyencumin ga Taywang Gyencumin na Bunun ku smrrhu ku pyux s'uli taya kya. ays ptyaw sebu Yanping ays psgayun 5 ru 11 alang. 11 alang hani ga, Kainisungan , Kamisatu , Kaminu , Nakanu , Su nun sung , Buklavu , Kalisahan , Minami , Vakangan , Pasikau , Talunas .
